channel.title: Wilderness Level

item.title: Wilderness Level
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

if (client.getAbsY() >= 3518 && client.getAbsX() > 2930 && client.getAbsX() < 3400) { wildernessLevel = (((client.getAbsY() - 3518) / 8) + 1); client.getExtraData().put("wildernessWarned", Boolean.TRUE); } else if (client.getAbsY() >= 9918 && client.getAbsX() > 3050 && client.getAbsX() < 3142) { wildernessLevel = (((client.getAbsY() - 9918) / 8) + 1); client.getExtraData().put("wildernessWarned", Boolean.TRUE); } else { wildernessLevel = -1; }

How would I make it that the whole map (which is the wilderness) level 30 wildy?

Read full topic
